title: SABSA Policy Layer Sections
description: Schema for validating SABSA policy layer sections with content, rationale, and error tracking

policyId.description: Policy identifier in format POL-YYYY-NNN (e.g., POL-2025-001)

layer.description: SABSA architectural layer for this artifact

version.description: Version number of this layer artifact, increments on regeneration

generatedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when this artifact was generated

generationStatus.description: Indicates whether all sections were successfully generated (complete) or if errors occurred (partial)

sections.description: Collection of section artifacts, keyed by section ID (e.g., '1-1', '2-3', '3-1')

title.description: Section title as defined in SABSA layer specification

content.description: Markdown-formatted section content. Null if generation failed for this section.

rationale_why.description: Framework references (NIST, ISO, CIS) explaining why this section was suggested. Null if generation failed.

rationale_condition.description: Explicit statement of which upstream requirement this section satisfies. Null if generation failed.

errors.description: Array of errors encountered during generation. Empty if generationStatus is 'complete'.

rawContent.description: Raw output before parsing failure, for manual recovery
